name: Common Sense Machines
description: CSM.ai is an AI platform that transforms 2D images or text into interactive 3D models and scenes for creative and professional use.
longDescription: Common Sense Machines (CSM.ai) is an innovative AI company focused on generating 3D content from simple inputs like images or text descriptions, mimicking how children learn about the world. Its mission is to democratize 3D creation, making it accessible to artists, designers, game developers, and hobbyists without requiring advanced technical skills. The platform solves the problem of time-consuming 3D modeling by using advanced AI to automate the process, allowing users to quickly prototype and iterate on ideas. CSM.ai serves users by providing tools that integrate seamlessly into workflows for game development, AR/VR experiences, and digital art. Overall, it bridges the gap between 2D concepts and fully realized 3D environments, fostering creativity and efficiency in various industries.
features: Image-to-3D conversion allows users to upload a single 2D image and generate a detailed 3D model in seconds, streamlining the creative process.
Text-to-3D functionality enables generating 3D scenes from descriptive text prompts, ideal for rapid prototyping without manual modeling.
Interactive 3D editing tools let users refine generated models with adjustments to lighting, textures, and poses for customized results.
Export options support popular formats like GLB, USDZ, and OBJ, making it easy to integrate models into software like Unity or Blender.
AI-powered scene composition automatically arranges elements into coherent 3D environments, saving time on layout design.
Real-time previews provide instant feedback on generations, allowing users to iterate quickly and achieve desired outcomes.
Collaboration features enable sharing and co-editing of 3D projects, beneficial for team-based creative work.
Asset library offers pre-generated 3D elements that users can remix or incorporate into their own scenes for inspiration.
High-fidelity rendering ensures generated models have realistic details, enhancing quality for professional applications.
Integration with AR/VR platforms allows direct export for immersive experiences, expanding use cases in virtual reality.

faqs.question: What is CSM.ai primarily used for?
faqs.answer: CSM.ai is used to generate 3D models and scenes from 2D images or text, helping users in creative fields like game design and digital art. It automates complex modeling tasks to make 3D creation faster and more accessible.

faqs.question: How does the image-to-3D feature work?
faqs.answer: Users upload a 2D image, and the AI analyzes it to create a 3D model with depth, textures, and lighting. The process takes seconds and can be refined further using editing tools.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan available?
faqs.answer: Yes, CSM.ai offers a free plan with limited generations and features, allowing users to test the platform before upgrading to paid tiers for unlimited access.

faqs.question: What file formats can I export 3D models to?
faqs.answer: You can export to formats like GLB, USDZ, OBJ, and more, compatible with tools such as Blender, Unity, and AR/VR applications.

faqs.question: Can I use CSM.ai for commercial projects?
faqs.answer: Yes, generated assets can be used commercially, but users should review the terms of service for any restrictions on usage rights.

faqs.question: How accurate are the AI-generated 3D models?
faqs.answer: The models are highly accurate for most inputs, with realistic details, but results can vary based on image quality and may require manual tweaks for perfection.

faqs.question: Does CSM.ai support text prompts for 3D generation?
faqs.answer: Yes, the text-to-3D feature lets you describe a scene in words, and the AI generates a corresponding 3D model or environment.

faqs.question: Is there a mobile app for CSM.ai?
faqs.answer: Currently, CSM.ai is web-based, but it is optimized for mobile browsers, with potential app development in the future.

faqs.question: How does CSM.ai handle user data and privacy?
faqs.answer: CSM.ai prioritizes privacy by not storing user uploads without permission and complying with data protection regulations like GDPR.

faqs.question: Can I collaborate with others on projects?
faqs.answer: Yes, the platform supports sharing links and collaborative editing for team projects.
